name: Routing Pattern
description: Introduces conditional logic into an agent's operational framework, enabling dynamic evaluation of criteria to select from a set of possible subsequent actions, moving beyond fixed execution paths.
when_to_use: ["Adaptive responses required","Classifying and directing queries","Multiple potential actions based on input","Dynamic decision-making"]
benefits: ["Flexibility","Context-aware behavior","Dynamic decision-making","Better handling of diverse inputs"]
drawbacks: ["Implementation complexity","Potential for misrouting if criteria are not well-defined"]
use_cases: ["Virtual assistants","AI-driven tutors","Automated data processing pipelines","Multi-agent systems"]
